description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if you buy TiUSD in TiTi-AMMs?
In principle, the more TiUSD you bought from TiTi-AMMs, the more rewards you will earn.
The use-to-earn rewards stem from community incentive allocation. Besides, the Rewards will be distributed to you in a linear way.
The displayed distributed reward is actually the accumulated TiTi Rewards, which increases everyday if you keep buying TiUSD in TiTi-AMMs.

Every 24 hours @UTC 12:00 a.m. the displayed expected rewards will reset to 0. Then the displayed expected TiTi Rewards  will show how many TiTi youâ€™ve earned exactly after the reset from the current time according to your proportion against all users' transaction volume buying TiTi using mUSDC in the past 24 hrs.
